P

performAction(Hero, TurnAction) - Method in class controllers.GameMaster
this method take in a player and action and does the requested action.
players - Variable in class controllers.GameMaster
this is the collection of players in the current game session.
playerTurn(Hero) - Method in class controllers.GameMaster
this method performs a turn for the player passed in.
playerUsePotion(Hero, Type) - Method in class controllers.GameMaster
this method uses a potion and creates an output string based on how much it restored the specified stat.
Potion - Class in models.potions.base
Potion Model Object
Potion(int, Type) - Constructor for class models.potions.base.Potion
Constructor for Potion it takes in a modifier and multiplies it with a random number between 1 - 10 inclusive and sets the type of potion with the type past in.
potionsLeft(Type) - Method in class models.monsters.Hero
takes in a type to find a corresponding potion array and returns how many potions are left in that array.
